name: Developer Roadmap Marketplace Plugin
author: Plugin Agent Marketplace
description: Comprehensive learning plugin with 7 specialized agents covering 71 developer roadmaps. Master frontend, backend, DevOps, AI/ML, databases, architecture, and security.

agents.name: Frontend Development Specialist
agents.description: Expert in frontend technologies, frameworks, and modern web development (React, Vue, Angular, Next.js, TypeScript)

agents.name: Backend Development Specialist
agents.description: Specialized in server-side technologies, frameworks, and backend architecture (Node.js, Python, Java, Go, Rust)

agents.name: DevOps & Cloud Infrastructure Specialist
agents.description: Expert in DevOps practices, cloud platforms, and infrastructure as code (AWS, Kubernetes, Docker, Terraform, Linux)

agents.name: AI & Machine Learning Specialist
agents.description: Specialized in AI engineering, data science, ML models, and AI Agent development

agents.name: Database & Data Management Specialist
agents.description: Expert in database design, optimization, and management (PostgreSQL, MongoDB, Redis, SQL)

agents.name: Architecture & System Design Specialist
agents.description: Specialized in system design, software architecture, API design, and scalable solutions

agents.name: Security & Quality Assurance Specialist
agents.description: Expert in cybersecurity, QA testing, secure coding, and compliance standards

commands.name: learn
commands.description: Start a personalized learning journey through the developer roadmap

commands.name: browse-roadmap
commands.description: Browse and explore all 71 available developer roadmaps

commands.name: assess-skills
commands.description: Assess your current knowledge level across different specializations

commands.name: marketplace-explore
commands.description: Explore recommended learning paths and career tracks

skills.name: backend-technologies
